description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Dragoon and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Holy Lance：Thrust forward with a forking lance gleaming with draconic fury to pierce all foes in 3 directions ahead of you, up to 2 tiles away.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Dragoon”
